features: HYDRATING BODY LOTION: Deeply moisturizes and protects your skin, leaving it hydrated and supple, with natural and organic plant ingredients like shea butter, jojoba oil, and aloe vera; it replenishes and locks in moisture for long-lasting hydration

AROMATHERAPY BENEFITS: Delightful aromatherapy body lotion infused with balancing essences of lemon, orange, mint, basil, litsea cubeba, lemongrass, and cedarwood to inspire senses and leave your skin feeling velvety smooth and soft

NATURAL FORMULA: Crafted with a natural formula that harnesses the goodness of organic and plant-based ingredients; is free from harsh chemicals, synthetic fragrances, and artificial additives, a pure and gentle addition to your skincare routine

VEGAN LOTION: A luxurious body lotion that it is both effective and compassionate vegan skincare that embraces a more sustainable and ethical beauty that’s 100% cruelty-free and formulated without parabens, sulfates, and harmful chemicals

100% HAPPINESS: Feel confident in your purchase knowing that our Mint Argan Body Lotion is crafted with care, using biodegradable formulas and 100% PCR plastic bottles, doing our part in bringing you joy while caring for the planet
body.description: Verbena Body Lotion, 16oz Great for men, women & kids Aromatic & nourishing Verbena Body Lotion hydrates & protects skin with natural & organic plant ingredients including shea butter, jojoba oil, aloe vera, & chamomile extract. The lightweight & moisturizing formula leaves skin feeling velvety smooth & soft. Highly absorbent & non-greasy, verbena lotion is infused with balancing essences of lemon, orange, mint, basil, litsea cubeba, lemongrass, & cedarwood. Contains natural & organic ingredients Infused with energizing essential oils No animal testing & vegan formula 100% post-consumer recycled plastic in our bottles

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Meet Pharmacopia When our founder couldn’t find a clean-beauty skincare regimen that addressed her own specific wellness needs, she started a line herself. Fueled by a quest that turned into a passion, Pharmacopia was born: A modern apothecary collection of better-for-you products for EVERY body, developed with natural-derived ingredients & thoughtful formulations. Our aromatherapeutic products leave you radiant—from the outside in—because we believe what you put on your skin matters. Verbena Body Lotion, 16oz Great for men, women & kids Aromatic & nourishing Verbena Body Lotion hydrates & protects skin with natural & organic plant ingredients including shea butter, jojoba oil, aloe vera, & chamomile extract. The lightweight & moisturizing formula leaves skin feeling velvety smooth & soft. Highly absorbent & non-greasy, verbena lotion is infused with balancing essences of lemon, orange, mint, basil, litsea cubeba, lemongrass, & cedarwood. Contains natural & organic ingredients Infused with energizing essential oils No animal testing & vegan formula 100% post-consumer recycled plastic in our bottles

Simplify your daily routine with our head-to-toe line up & scents that work for everyone. Citrus Infused with energizing essences of organic orange, bergamot, and grapefruit essential oils, Pharmacopia’s Citrus collection was created to awaken and uplift the spirit and mood — and set the day in happy motion. Mint Argan Balancing essences of lemon verbena, orange, mint, basil, litsea cubeba, lemongrass and cedarwood, meld and mingle in Pharmacopia’s Verbena collection, designed to help center and ground — promoting clarity and focus. Verbena Moroccan inspired, with essences peppermint and green tea, Pharmacopia’s Mint Argan Collection is slightly minty, slightly floral — and more than a little bit intoxicating. Hotel Collection Our Argan Oil products are found in the luxurious bathrooms at Hyatt Regency Hotels. Now you can buy it for home too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Lotion--Delicious Natural Citrus Scent!
reviews.reviewText: I finally found the lotion I've been looking for. I have spent far too much $ on other lotions to find a truly natural citrus scent. This one is beautiful! I suffer from migraines so I cannot wear any perfumes and most scents trigger the headaches instantly. This is an all-natural scent--the real thing. So, not only is it light and lovely, but it doesn't harm my health. It is smooth, and dries quickly. Just luscious!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This lotion is the nectar from Heaven
reviews.reviewText: I usually dont like to use moisturizers and find them greasy but Parmacopia Body Lotion is awesome all around. I stayed over in Hilton Hotel and they had Pharmacopia lemon body wash, shampoo, conditioner and body lotion in the bathroom. After a day in the sun i decided I should put on some moisturizer and used the Citrus Body lotion that was in the bathroom, To my surprise it was not greasy and the scent was pure and clean. I could tell it was a high quality product and upon further examination found it to be all natural and clean. I then used the shampoo and conditioner and body wash and found all of them to be amazing. The lemon scent was vibrant and uniquely clean smelling, The scent remained on my skin and i received compliments from the other wedding guests informing me how nice my cologne smelled, unbeknownst that it was body lotion.I looked up Pharmacopia and found that it was available on Amazon. I bought the lotion and body wash. Its a staple in the bathroom now. Once you try Pharmacopia nothing else will do. They are the best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smells so good!
reviews.reviewText: I stayed at the Hyatt Regency Huntington Beach and they had this lotion in the unscented version. I liked how silky it was and how it kept my skin moisturized so I bought the citrus scent and it smells so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smells wonderful and very light weight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A total winner!
reviews.reviewText: This was discovered through a small sample I got staying at a hotel, I think. I threw it into my bag and didn’t think anymore about it until I went away on a trip and found myself needing a moisturizer and found this in my bag. It was so startlingly good I used every last drop of it then found myself comparing everything else to it and missing it. Ordered a full size and I’ve never looked back. It is now one of my holy-grail moisturizers (and my DIL says I have the softest skin of anyone she knows). I love that it has a pump so it’s extremely easy to use, never messy, and less waste. The scent is so fresh and bright and always makes me feel like I just pumped up a good mood in scent form. The moisturizer itself smooths on delightfully with no stickiness and the perfect viscosity - not too thick and not watery or runny. It soaks in and leaves my skin feeling sooo super smooth. Whenever I use it my husband comments on how soft my skin is. As a point of reference, my skin usually tends toward the dry side. This is, in my book, my perfect body moisturizer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Silky with Lemon scent
reviews.reviewText: Verbena body lotion offers a silky smooth finish to dry skin. It has a definite lemony scent. It is similar to a spa lotion which I can never find anywhere so I use it as a close substitute. It does come out of the pump quite generously so be aware because you don't need too much if just applying to your hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I found out about this awesome lotion because the hotel we stayed in recently had all their products, but I really loved the lotion! It is excellent!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing Scent gives off spa vibes
reviews.reviewText: This lotion has such lightly refreshing scent and each time I use it, I feel like I'm momentarily transported to a spa. I love the scent, however, the lotion itself is a little bit watery for my liking. I feel like the thicker the product, the more moisture it deposits. I do feel like it moisturizes well though, so if you're looking for a lighter consistency in a lotion, this would be for you! I will continue to purchase just for the amazing scent.
Lovely fragrance. Leaves your skin feeling soft and no oily residue.
This cream is excellent, smells wonderful, spreads on easily, best results I have had for a long time with other creams for similar price
The Citrus smell is so refreshing and more important the lotion actually works in moisturizing the skin. I use it 3-4 times a week on my arms and legs. Would recommend for men !
The product is great but when I received it, it was frozen solid
